column2: "To be honest, I didn't think you'd succeed."
"All my calculations indicated that I'd have to sacrifice either you or Matoi."
"I was running simulations on how I'd support the rest of ARKS after those scenarios..."

"...but now that's all gone up in smoke. My simulations, my models...
Time to start over from scratch."
"Don't get me wrong, that's a good thing! I didn't want those scenarios to come true!"
"I'm so glad that my calculations were wrong, and my predictions aren't set in stone."
"I'm sure Xion was thinking the same, too."
"Unfortunately, these events now leave us with a very large problem."
"...Welcome back, Matoi."
"...Good to be back!"
"That new outfit really suits you."
"Gee, thanks!"
"So, Xiao. About what happens next..."
"Yes, I know. The [Profound Darkness] will return..."
"You two saw it, didn't you? The form of [Persona] within that of the [Profound Darkness]."
"It's retreated for now, but there's no doubt we'll face it again, and soon."
"We must be prepared to meet it with full force. The Council of Six is spearheading our preparation efforts."
"<%me>, Matoi."
"Your strength will be the key to the battle ahead."
"We're counting on the both of you, so please, be prepared."
"Yes sir!"
"Is This Reason"
"7章 あなたがうまれたそのりゆう"
